messages.subject: PAYMENT NOTIFICATION/ AUDIT REPORT ref.neiti\5\0512
messages.body:
From EXTRACTIVE INDUSTRY Sat May 12 20:25:53 2012

 
From The Desk Of,
Orji Ogbonna Orji
Director Communications
Nigeria Extractive Industry Transparency Initiative
+234-70-8070-4196
     
         
                                                          PAYMENT NOTIFICATION/ AUDIT REPORT ref.neiti\5\0512
 Sir,           steve           
It is with immense pleasure that we at the Nigeria Extractive Industry Transparency Initiative convey this important information to you.  Recently the Federal Government of Nigeria audited the Payment Schedule of Transaction between Oil Companies, Contracts and the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and we discovered some lapses in the Nations Accounts procedure in that Sector
 
The accounts was audited by the HART GROUP, an American Auditing Firm, for the Nigeria Extractive Industry Transparency Initiative have uncovered large-scales fraud ever recorded in the industry in recent time. We discovered a monumental scam showing wide spread discrepancies involving amount of money in the neighborhood of US$240,000,000.00  (Two Hundred and Forty Million US Dollars Only), which the Federal Government is owing Foreign Contractors in that sector. We also discovered that your contract sum have not been paid, hence we write this letter to you, for the immediate full payment of your contract sum in this quarter of the year.
 
This audit examined all the financial transaction in the Nation's Oil Industry from 1999 to 2012 was unable to reconcile the figures provided by the Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) and the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).
We have forwarded you contract information to the Office of the Minister for Finance and the Accountant General of the Federation for their observations and comment on your payment. You are requested to contact my office immediately you receive this notice. You are now warned not to contract any other office for your contract payment.
Forward your reply by PHONE CALL, EMAIL 0R SMS TO +234-70-8070-4196
     
          
Your urgent reply is needed
Yours Faithfully,
Orji Ogbonna Orji
Director Communications
Nigeria Extractive Industry Transparency Initiative
messages.raw:
Orji Orji

Recently the Federal Government of Nigeria audited the Payment Schedule of Transaction between Oil Companies, Contracts and the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and we discovered some lapses in the Nations Accounts procedure in that Sector

The accounts was audited by the HART GROUP, an American Auditing Firm, for the Nigeria Extractive Industry Transparency Initiative have uncovered large-scales fraud ever recorded in the industry in recent time. We discovered a monumental scam showing wide spread discrepancies involving amount of money in the neighborhood of US$240,000,000.00 (Two Hundred and Forty Million US Dollars Only), which the Federal Government is owing Foreign Contractors in that sector. We also discovered that your contract sum have not been paid, hence we write this letter to you, for the immediate full payment of your contract sum in this quarter of the year.

This audit examined all the financial transaction in the Nation's Oil Industry from 1999 to 2012 was unable to reconcile the figures provided by the Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) and the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). We have forwarded you contract information to the Office of the Minister for Finance and the Accountant General of the Federation for their observations and comment on your payment. You are requested to contact my office immediately you receive this notice. You are now warned not to contract any other office for your contract payment.
Forward your reply by PHONE CALL, EMAIL 0R SMS TO +234-70-8070-4196

Your urgent reply is needed
Yours Faithfully,
Orji Ogbonna Orji
Director Communications
Nigeria Extractive Industry Transparency Initiative

Hey man


VAT? There is no VAT to pay. I travel a lot man and can tell you that you are being ripped off if someone is telling you that you need VAT. Only goods imported into the UK require VAT and an atm card isnt goods.


07005 4155665 is my number if you want to call me. I am flying out this weekend to start shooting my new film so might be a few days before I come back to you.


Laters dude

messages.body:
I really dont understand. I am in Bermuda right now filming so I cant have my phone on set so you cant call me but we need to sort this out asap.
I would only need to pay VAT if I was buying something in the UK and as business and as I am doing neither, I think you are being given a load of rubbish by this company. As I am not in Nigeria then its vat exempt. I would only pay VAT if it was being delivered in country which it isnt so it needs to be shipped without VAT as an export which means that VAT is not required to be charged. As I travel all over the place I am very up to date on customs and VAT and import duty.
Advantage of being in the porn industry!
You are not interested in starring in a porn film or earning money by supplying girls to star in them are you? My company pays $5000 per girl recommended..


SPR

messages.body:
Dear Orji


I am in Bermuda for another week. We make several films at a time while we are here. Having to have sex all the time in the tropics.. its a tough life being a porn star LOL.
We dont mind what colour the skin of the girls are. A hottie is the same whatever the colour :) My producer and I just select girls from pictures and then they get invited over for an audtition. We pay all the transit and accomodation if that happens and if its one of the girls you have proposed then you get $5k for each one. We see on average 50 girls a year so even if we only hire 10 that you have recomended, you get $50k. Not a bad income anywhere really.
All you need to do it get me some pictures and email them to me. We organise all the documents that are needed, visa etc so you dont have to worry about all that. We like to make it easy for you so you can get what you deserve.


So if you have some ladies in mind, get me some pictures and email them to me here. If they are black, we prefer them to be in white underwear particularly stockings and suspenders and if they are white the same in black.


As for the Bermuda triangle, apart from it being a song by Barry Manilow, I cant really tell you much else. I think its all hokum myself.


Be cool
SPR

messages.body:
Dear STEVE
Please recheck the MTCN number again, the country were you send the money from, the country you send the money to. It is very important you cross check for us to know where the problem is from
Send the transaction receipt to me, from the inquires that I make you can send money from your valid credit card.
Our closet air port is Lagos international air port but you require an entry visa, what you will  do is this give us the valid address where you will be in the next one week I  will send the card there for you.
Contact any western union office in Thailand for them to ratify the problem.
Regards,
MR ORJI.O.ORJI

Our closet air port is Lagos international air port but you require an entry visa, what you will do is this give us the valid address where you will be in the next one week I will send the card there for you.

Stevieperv Rammer
Dear OO

Im sure I told you that I had a friend in Nigeria who supplied girls. Did it not twig with you then? I dont need a visa, I am Nigerian.(oohh such a liar!) I shall find a western union office somewhere today. I have only just got in! LOL

LAters

SPR

messages.body:
Dear STEVE
Where are you as of today, I look forward to meet you when you arrive Lagos. What is the location that you will send the western union from?
Regards,
MR ORJI.O.ORJI
messages.raw:
Orji Orji

messages.body:
Dear OO

I am currently in Phuket with a couple of girls enjoying myself having the time off. I can be in Lagos in the next few days so perhaps you can meet me at the airport and we can grab a drink.
I am from Afikpo and like to get back home from time to time.

I dey come

SPR
